I am a self-taught and self-driven Indian artist with a penchant for traditional art forms. I believe that every artwork is a story in itself and has the power to connect with you on an emotional level. Since childhood, I have been passionate about art and painting. Playing with colors and mediums for creating an art piece is simply therapeutic and gratifying for artists like me. My artworks mainly feature Indian mythology through folk-based art forms such as Madhubani painting. Browse through my ‘Art Gallery’ and connect with me for customization.

For bussiness queries

— Asita Dwivedi

— Asita Dwivedi
